Quickstride stays put as do his passengers.  

" Okay that answers all of m=
y questions. "

Rattrap nods and glances over to Dinobot.

" Yep, he got wh=
at was comm'n ta him." 

Straight Shot appears agitated.

" He still didn't=
 have a right ta start on Rattrap like that.  He got off way too easy.  "

=
Quickstride  turns his head in her direction.

" Come again?"

She turns to=
 him.

"  What he needs is a good nip in the tail end.  Tucson would have p=
ut him in his place real fast if he were here.  Really fast."

Perpetually =
on the move and constantly busy.
